item.title: HELP! Colour Changing! PLEASE HELP!
item.dc:creator: @theyungbubba theyungbubba
item.description:
@theyungbubba wrote:

how would i recolour a model… DONT FLAME! im new with models… ALL OF IT!
today i just learned how to add a model so ya!

->everyone has to start sometime right?!?!

i got this hat.

if(i == 15201) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 7073; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 931; class8.anInt174 = 2451; class8.anInt181 = 690; class8.anInt190 = 160; class8.anInt198 = 1856; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = -1; class8.anInt194 = -8; class8.anInt165 = 186; class8.anInt200 = 362; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt175 = 28; class8.anInt197 = 86; class8.aString170 = "Fuschia Cavalier"; class8.aByteArray178 = "A Fuschia Cavalier.".getBytes(); }
IT IS LIGHT RED…

i got this cape.

if(i == 15200) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[2]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[2]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 926; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 924; class8.anIntArray156[1] = 127; class8.anIntArray160[1] = 924; class8.anInt174 = 3196; class8.anInt181 = 1370; class8.anInt190 = 204; class8.anInt198 = 804; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = 0; class8.anInt194 = 0; class8.anInt165 = 3189; class8.anInt200 = 3194; class8.anInt174 = 3196; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Cape Of Legends"; class8.aByteArray178 = "A Dragon Cape Of Legends".getBytes(); }its like a dark dragon red.

so like what would i do to get the cape light red(same color as the hat??)
and for future stuff, what would i change…
